meanings.definition: To fill with awe or wonder.
meanings.sent1: The beautiful fireworks display was truly awing.
meanings.sent2: The majestic mountain scenery never fails to be awing.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten's attempt to climb the stairs was quite awing.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected kindness of strangers can be truly awing.
meanings.sent5: The vastness of the universe is always awing to contemplate.

meanings.sent1: Her incredible talent for singing never fails to awing the audience.
meanings.sent2: The intricate details of the painting were truly awing.
meanings.sent3: The magician's tricks were so awing that the audience gasped in amazement.
meanings.sent4: The power of nature can be awing in its destructive force.
meanings.sent5: The bravery of the firefighters was truly awing to witness.
